title: Exam Instructions: What You Need to Know
story: Poster 1 FINAL EXAM INSTRUCTIONS Doors close 5 minutes before the exam begins. Show your student ID card to examiner when you enter the room. No phones, no books. Poster 2 BEFORE THE EXAM Have your ID card ready. Listen to the instructions. Arrive 10 minutes before exam. IN THE EXAM Mobile phones switched off and put away. ID card visible on the desk. No talking.  No food or drinks in exam room. Poster 3 Follow the examiner's instructions. If you have a question, raise your hand. No mobile phones, books or bags in the exam. Please use a blue or black pen.
summary: Learn the essential instructions for taking an exam, including arriving early, following examiner's instructions, keeping mobile phones and other prohibited items away, and using a blue or black pen.
image: An image of a student sitting at a desk with their ID card visible, while a teacher stands nearby giving instructions.
